column1: The Fool wanders where others fear to step, carrying eternity in an empty sack.  Occult Fragment
Every abyss begins with the first innocent footfall.  Hermetic Aphorism
Unknowing is the only door through which the soul escapes the world.  Esoteric Maxim
He who leaps without reason may yet land upon truth.  Alchemical Saying
The path of the Fool is paved with mirrors that reflect no face.  Mystical Fragment
The mad are sacred, for they travel where gods conceal their steps.  Gnostic Whisper
